trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Archivia le risorse collegate da inviare come parte di un messaggio di posta elettronica.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the LinkedResourceCollection class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Viene restituita un'istanza della classe LinkedResourceCollection dal <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>occupato.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>su tutte le visualizzazioni in questa raccolta.</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
You do not need to call it in your application.
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>
